name: Juicyfind
description:
This is my game for the Raven Jam Remake!

Play with four of the Flatworld's characters and their abilities. Run forward as long as you can hoping the increasing speed will not make you get caught.

If your resolution doesn't let you see the whole screen then press F.

CONTROLS:

ARROWS to move

Z to switch characters

X to use yami's clock

F to toggle fullscreen

ESC to main menu
